`r under_construction()`

Snowball being rolled up hill: Calculate the work done to roll a snowball up  hill. $$\int_0^{100} \rho\,d\, f'(x)  \sqrt{1 + f'(x)^2}\,  dx$$ where $d$ is the depth of the snow (1") and the units of $x$ position are feet.
